name: screenbeard
message:
Melissa,

I had a quick look at Protonotes. It IS very basic (and only works in Internet Explorer) - it seems limited to adding sticky notes to pages, not targeted annotation like Jump Knowledge. Really, it might be useful to teachers, but isn't really anything like a page annotator - plus the language on the front page makes it seem geared towards a very select group of people (with large scale group projects).
